item.description:
Last week we were able to combine with a couple of other groups but that also meant that the courts filled up by 10 am. We can't predict the overall level of tennis mayhem at Conard this Saturday so the start time this week will be 9 am if anyone else wants to connect that early (feel free to let me know). Show up when you can but the "earlier the better" theory may be advisable in order to secure courts.

I look forward to seeing everyone on Saturday. Call me at 559-7983 with any questions or comments. Thanks

?.and don't forget fluids for hydration
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a red hat & sunglasses

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis in West Hartford
